mapper.select: select Charge from scm_b_gys_mater_pic inner JOIN scm_b_purcharseorder on scm_b_gys_mater_pic.matnr=scm_b_purcharseorder.matnr where scm_b_purcharseorder.ID=#{base_Id} and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.GYSACCOUNT=#{account} and scm_b_purcharseorder.lifnr=#{account} and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.IS_DELETEMARK=1 order by scm_b_gys_mater_pic.create_time desc
mapper.sql: ID, CODE, NAME, GYSACCOUNT, MATER_ID, CHARGE, COMMENTS, STATE, FILE_ID, IS_DELETEMARK, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID
mapper.select:
select * from scm_b_gys_mater_pic
INNER JOIN scm_b_userandarea A2 ON CONCAT(scm_b_gys_mater_pic.werks,scm_b_gys_mater_pic.lgort) = A2.AreaID AND A2.UserID=${userid}
where 1=1 and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.ID like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.id} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.CODE like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.code} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.NAME like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.name} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.GYSACCOUNT like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.gysaccount} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.MATER_ID like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.materId} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.matnr like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.matnr} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.CHARGE like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.charge} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.COMMENTS like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.comments} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.STATE =#{ vScmBGyspicUser.state} and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.FILE_ID like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.fileId} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.IS_DELETEMARK =#{ vScmBGyspicUser.isDeletemark} and (scm_b_gys_mater_pic.GYSACCOUNT = #{keyword_gys} or scm_b_gys_mater_pic.Name like concat('%', #{keyword_gys} ,'%')) and (scm_b_gys_mater_pic.matnr = #{ keyword_mater} or scm_b_gys_mater_pic.TXZ01 like concat('%', #{ keyword_mater} ,'%'))
and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.TXZ01 like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.txz01} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.PRODUCE_AREA like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.produceArea} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.SPEC like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.spec} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.SPELL_CODE like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.spellCode} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.AuditCause like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.AuditCause} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.werks like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.werks} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.werkt like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.werkt} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.lgort like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.lgort} ,'%') and scm_b_gys_mater_pic.lgortName like concat('%', #{ vScmBGyspicUser.lgortName} ,'%')
